_2xb3.finalProject.model

Class GrantDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • _2xb3.finalProject.model.GrantDatabase

  • public class GrantDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes the grant database which manages the grants. It loads, sanitizes, optimizes, sorts, searches, projects, and analyzes the grants. Uses the GSON library to convert Java objects to JSON Strings.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GrantDatabase()
      Standard constructor which loads and sanitizes the database files, then save them in an efficient format for faster loading in the future.

    • Method Summary

      Generates a Series of grants based on a given X,Y column scheme.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GrantDatabase

        public GrantDatabase()
        Standard constructor which loads and sanitizes the database files, then save them in an efficient format for faster loading in the future.
        Parameters:
        useBackup - If false, it will not load previously optimized dataset, but reload and sanitize from scratch.

    • Method Detail

      • getGrantsFor

        public java.util.List<Grant> getGrantsFor(GrantColumn column,
                                          java.lang.Object searchFor)
        Obtains grants for a given column based on a search criteria.
        Parameters:
        column - Column to search in
        searchFor - Criteria to search for
        Returns:
        List of grants which fit the criterion

      • getGrants

        public java.util.List<Grant> getGrants()
        Accesses all the grants in the database.
        Returns:
        list of grants

      • generateSeries

        public Series generateSeries(java.util.List<Grant> grants,
                             GrantColumn x,
                             GrantColumn y)
        Generates a Series of grants based on a given X,Y column scheme. This can be used to plot graphs.
        Parameters:
        grants - List of grants to generate series from
        x - Independent column
        y - Dependent column
        Returns:
        A series which can be plotted
        See Also:
        Series
